00099     {
00100         return Vector3(
00101             this->X * scalar,
00102             this->Y * scalar,
00103             this->Z * scalar
00104         );

00133     // Equality Comparison operators
00134     bool Vector3::operator== (const Vector3 &Vec2)
00135     {
00136         if ( Vec2.X == this->X && Vec2.Y == this->Y && Vec2.Z == this->Z )
00137             { return true; }
00138         return false;
00139     }

00142     {
00143         if ( Vec2.getX() == this->X && Vec2.getY() == this->Y && Vec2.getZ() == this->Z )
00144             { return true; }
00145         return false;

00272     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00273     // Manual Conversions
00274     btVector3 Vector3::GetBulletVector3() const
00275     {
00276         btVector3 Theirs;
00277         Theirs.setX(this->X);
00278         Theirs.setY(this->Y);
00279         Theirs.setZ(this->Z);
00280         Theirs.setW(0);
00281         return Theirs;
00282     }
00283 
00284     void Vector3::ExtractBulletVector3(btVector3 Ours)
00285     {
00286         this->X=Ours.getX();
00287         this->Y=Ours.getY();
00288         this->Z=Ours.getZ();
00289     }
00290 
00291     Ogre::Vector3 Vector3::GetOgreVector3() const
00292     {
00293         Ogre::Vector3 Theirs;
00294         Theirs.x=this->X;
00295         Theirs.y=this->Y;
00296         Theirs.z=this->Z;
00297         return Theirs;
00298     }
00299 
00300     void Vector3::ExtractOgreVector3(Ogre::Vector3 Ours)
00301     {
00302         this->X=Ours.x;
00303         this->Y=Ours.y;
00304         this->Z=Ours.z;
00305     }
00306 
00307 
00308     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00309     // Manual Conversions
00310 
00311     Real Vector3::Distance(const Vector3 &Vec2) const
00312     {
00313         float Xdelta = this->X - Vec2.X;
00314         float Ydelta = this->Y - Vec2.Y;
00315         float Zdelta = this->Z - Vec2.Z;
00316         return Ogre::Math::Sqrt( Xdelta*Xdelta + Ydelta*Ydelta + Zdelta*Zdelta );
00317     }
00318

00323 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::Vector3& x)
00324 {
00325     stream << "[" << x.X << "," << x.Y << "," << x.Z << "]";
00326     return stream;
00327 }
